explains: adj. 雇佣的；唯利是图的
n. 雇佣兵；唯利是图者
wordGroup: mercenary marriage 买卖婚姻；着眼实利的婚姻

sentences.en: "I hate to sound mercenary," Labane said, "but am I getting paid to be in this play of yours?"
sentences.cn: “我不愿让自己听起来惟利是图，”拉班说：“但是参与你这出戏演出我会得到报酬吗？”

sentences.en: She's interested in him for purely mercenary reasons.
sentences.cn: 她对他感兴趣完全是为了贪图金钱。
